about.title: What Makes {{name}} Perfect for Studying?
about.study_culture_description: {{name}} is a student's paradise with cafes like {{cafeName1}} and {{cafeName2}} offering the perfect blend of quiet atmosphere and focused work environment. Popular study spots like {{cafeName3}} and {{cafeName4}} truly understand student needs: extended opening hours, comfortable seating, and just the right noise level create ideal conditions for productive studying. The city has developed a distinctive cafe culture that supports academic work - with dedicated study areas, power outlets at every seat, and staff who understand that great ideas take time.
about.wifi_description: All recommended cafes feature fast, free WiFi - perfect for online research, e-learning platforms, and writing assignments. Many locations also offer printing services and special quiet zones so you can fully focus on your studies.
about.etiquette_title: How to behave properly in study cafes
etiquette_items: Keep it quiet - avoid loud conversations, especially during peak study hours
Headphones are mandatory for videos, music, or online lectures
Support the cafe - order something every 2-3 hours to 'rent' your spot
Stay organized - use only the space you need and clean up after yourself
Mind the timing - during busy hours, students should make room for paying customers
about.report_cafe_description: Been to a cafe that turned out unsuitable for studying? Help fellow students by reporting cafes that:
report_cafe_reasons: Have become too noisy, making concentrated work impossible
No longer welcome students or have introduced time limits
Have removed their study-friendly amenities (WiFi, outlets)
about.suggest_cafe_description: Know a fantastic study cafe in {{name}} that's not on our list yet? Share your secret spot and help fellow students! We're looking for cafes with:
suggest_cafe_requirements: Quiet atmosphere that enables concentrated work
Comfortable seating for multi-hour study sessions
Stable WiFi and plenty of power outlets
Student-friendly policies (no time limits, fair prices)

faq.title: Frequently Asked <highlight>Questions</highlight> About Study Cafes
faq.description: Everything you need to know about studying in cafes - from choosing the right spot to finding the perfect study hours.
faq.what-makes-study-friendly.question: What makes a cafe the perfect study spot?
faq.what-makes-study-friendly.answer: An ideal study cafe offers a quiet atmosphere without distracting noise, comfortable seating for hours of work, fast WiFi for online research, and plenty of power outlets for your devices. It's also important that students are genuinely welcome and won't be asked to leave after just one hour.
faq.how-long-can-stay.question: How long am I allowed to study in a cafe?
faq.how-long-can-stay.answer: In most student-friendly cafes, you can stay for several hours, especially during off-peak times. A good rule of thumb: order something new every 2-3 hours and be especially mindful during lunch hours or weekends when the cafe gets busy.
faq.best-study-times.question: When's the best time to study in cafes?
faq.best-study-times.answer: It's usually quietest in the morning (10 AM - 12 PM) and early afternoon (2 PM - 5 PM). Avoid lunch rush (12 PM - 2 PM) and weekend mornings - that's when it gets loud and crowded. Evenings after 7 PM usually quiet down again.

why_study_cafes.title: Perfect Study Environment
why_study_cafes.description: Study cafes offer the ideal balance of ambient noise, comfortable seating, and academic atmosphere. Unlike libraries, they provide the flexibility of longer hours, food and beverages, and a more relaxed environment that many students find conducive to productivity and focus.

global_coverage.title: Global Network of Study Spots
global_coverage.description: Our curated list spans {{count}} countries, ensuring you can find quality study environments whether you're a local student, digital nomad, or traveling academic. Each location is verified for student-friendly policies and study amenities.
